title: Anyone else here a Pastafarian?
body:
I feel everyone should appreciate pasta the way I do. For me, it is a way of life, and I do not wish for this to be taken lightly. I am sharing my most core values as a human being and I believe the world would be a better place if more people were Pastafarians.

please pay your respects to the pasta gods below

https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSvwAmg-bPa9yFyBXFh24F-ceC-ijVi5J_aoy_fgOlHJVyQg9pU

http://chocolate-broccoli.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/IMG_5372.jpg

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eCkp1s_PxM4/UtfvHMEBzpI/AAAAAAAAGw0/mqeBjUvjpEE/s1600/IMG_5981.JPG

for advanced stragegies for producing high quality pasta. I recommend the following:
